people.map: function(doc) { if(doc.authors.length !== undefined) { for(i in doc.authors) { emit(doc._id, {'role': 'author', '_id': doc.authors[i]}); } } if(doc.reviewers.length !== undefined) { for(i in doc.reviewers) { emit(doc._id, {'_id': doc.reviewers[i], 'role': 'reviewer'}); } }}

for.map: function(doc) { if(doc.authors.length !== undefined) { for(i in doc.authors) { emit(doc.authors[i], { 'id': doc._id, 'title' doc.title, 'role': 'author' }); } } if(doc.reviewers.length !== undefined) { for(i in doc.reviewers) { emit(doc.reviewers[i], { 'id': doc._id, 'title' doc.title, 'role': 'reviewer' }); } }}

validate_doc_update: function(newDoc, oldDoc, userCtx, secObj) { if(oldDoc && oldDoc.authors.length > 0 && oldDoc.authors.indexOf('org.couchdb.user:' + userCtx.name) == -1) { throw 'only authors may modify a paper'; } }
